summary: Website for Bhagyashree Makeover & Spa offering makeover, hair, and skin services with both in-parlour and home service options, showcasing services and enabling WhatsApp appointment/discount inquiries.

existing_features.title: Create a responsive, single-page marketing website for a beauty parlour business that clearly communicates: (1) the business offers makeover, hair, and skin expertise, (2) services are available both In-Parlour and as Home services, and (3) Home services have no extra cost.

Add a Services section that lists and describes the following service categories as distinct cards/tiles: All functional Makeups; Skin & Facial treatment; Hair Care & Styling; Bridal Makeup; Saree & Dupatta Draping; Essential & Grooming.
Add prominent WhatsApp call-to-action buttons/links (e.g., in the header/hero and in a Contact section) that open WhatsApp to request appointments and discounts.

Include standard marketing sections suitable for a small local service business: Header navigation (anchors), Hero (headline + subheadline + CTA), About/Why Choose Us (brief), Service Options (In-Parlour vs Home), and Contact (WhatsApp CTA).
Define and apply one coherent visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) appropriate for a beauty parlour brand, and enforce it consistently across the page.
Add basic SEO and sharing metadata for the site (page title, description, and social preview defaults) reflecting the beauty parlour services and WhatsApp appointment flow.
Render generated static images (logo/hero) from frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the layout (header/hero) without routing images through the backend.
Update the websiteâ€™s displayed business name from "Beauty Parlour" to "Bhagyashree Makeover & Spa" anywhere it appears in the UI branding (e.g., header brand text and footer brand text/copyright).
Update SEO and social sharing metadata to use the business name "Bhagyashree Makeover & Spa" (HTML <title>, og:title, and twitter:title).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a beauty parlour business website with service listings (makeup, skin/facial, hair, bridal makeup, saree/dupatta draping, essential & grooming) and WhatsApp contact for appointments/discounts.
